name: leabsd

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)), wcel(c0, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))

body.origin: |- wi(wcel(c0, cr), wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wbr(c0, cle, cfv(cabs, c0)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: A real number is less than or equal to its absolute value. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-May-2016.)
